title: Sol Badguy Soundpack

embed.description: DOWNLOAD LINK: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bwn_pXqT56faeWpLOThQa2dBZUE/view?usp=sharing After so many games of losing and hearing that stupid announcer, I decided to make my own soundpack to spice up LoL. I've taken sound clips from 300, Metal Gear Solid, Portal, Dragon Ball Z and Unreal Tournament and made them into a somewhat complete soundpack.

body:
Ladies and Gentleman, I proudly present to you...my soundpack ^_^
It replaces the dull boring voice announcer and there are some extras, such as custom songs for champ select, sound files if you want to use them in your own soundpack and hear them, as well as a custom countdown timer. I'd love for you all to give the video a watch, like and share if you like it, and please do download the soundpack and give it and the custom songs/custom countdown in the extras a shot. There are also clear concise noob-friendly instructions on how to install the soundpack (copy-paste-rename) but give me a message if you have questions or trouble with it. I would like to share this with the rest of the LoL community. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QoycMTnZeMY

Enjoy

replies.body: What happens when your game updates? do u have to re-do this again?
Haha you like it? Did you like the Allied Reconnected one? (Hallelujah) :P
yea that's my favorite part as well. (Steve Carell @3:24) that captures the moment all to well xD

Are some of the announcements ripped out from Dota2?

Also where do you get the others from tho?

Nope. No sounds are from Dota 2. As for everything else, I just got it off youtube using the website http://www.youtube-mp3.org - The unreal tournament 1/2k14/ 3 female and male voice announcers, Dragon Ball Z, Asura's Wrath, The Office, Metal Gear Solid, 300, Portal, etc etc.

Have you tried the custom songs/custom countdown?
God I love the Unreal Tournament announcers :)
